project_name: UPM-2776427 - 3500 Steeles Ave East Markham - Repair of  Liebert AC units actuator valves
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Sebastian Vandervort (2):work order closed by Sebastian Vandervort (3):work planning by Sebastian Vandervort (4):offer approved by Sebastian Vandervort (5):offer submitted by Sebastian Vandervort

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: Liebert chill water AC units actuator valves stems are worn out and parts need to be replaced. Total five valves are selected for repair. One new valve to be purchased to minimise downtime.
scope_of_work.scope: Vendor Ainsworth will be removing each valve one at a time and new valve installed in the unit until repaired one is ready to fit back. Work will continue in this pattern until all five are repaired.
scope_of_work.justification: To avoid water under floor and keep energy savings up by optimising cooling efficiency.

project_name: UPM-2776574 - 3600 Steeles Ave East Markham - Fuel filtration and polishing of Main Convault tank and Generators Belly Tanks #1 and #2
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Sebastian Vandervort (2):work order closed by Sebastian Vandervort (3):work planning by Sebastian Vandervort (4):offer approved by Sebastian Vandervort (5):offer submitted by Sebastian Vandervort

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: As per 2022 fuel analysis conducted by Toromont, Fuel filtration and polishing have been recommended on Generators belly tanks #1 and #2 and the Main Convault storage tank. Fuel analysis results have indicated high particle count above the ISO 18/16/13 cleanliness recommendation
scope_of_work.scope: Fuel Pure to conduct Filtration on one unit at a time. No isolation required. Units will remain online and on standby. Vendor to provide filtration reports and certificates when completed.
scope_of_work.justification: filtration ensures that debris like rust, scale, and dirt do not get into the engine and they also keep water out as well. These impurities can wreak havoc on a diesel engine impacting performance.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Fouled Fuel could potentially impact engine performance and cause outages.

scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Build up of hydrogen in the battery room as a result of malfunctioning sensors

project_name: UPM-2776581 - 245 Consumers Road Toronto - Cleanup of CHS, IBMC, GSA areas for exit of DC at 245Consumers and 275Viger
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Sebastian Vandervort (2):rejected by Sebastian Vandervort (3):offer submitted by Sebastian Vandervort

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: Cleanup of CHS, IBMC, GSA areas for exit of DC at 245Consumers and 275Viger
scope_of_work.scope:
Customer (CHS, IBMC, GSA) is vacating DC and we need an estimate to provide:
-224 power whips to be powered down and removed
1- Identify breakers and relevant whips
2- Confirming the cabinets, breakers and whips number
3- Opening breakers
4- Removing whips
5- Installing junction box if it is required
-procurement and replacement of solid 80 wooden core tiles
-procurement and replacement of solid 35 aluminum core straight edge tiles
-procurement and replacement of solid 15 aluminum core tapered corner tiles
-clean the under ground floor by removing wreckages and vacuum the floor ( HYPO Filter Vacuum).
Aside from the above, cabling and miscellaneous infrastructure removal will be performed by Catech and their quotations need to be taken in consideration

245 Consumers Road, Toronto – Areas for Removal :
CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 32 – CHS, CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 33 – CHS,
CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 73 – CHS, CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 85 – CHS,
CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 86 – CHS, CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 87 – CHS,
CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 88 – CHS, CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 89 – CHS,
CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 90 – CHS, CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 102 – CHS,
CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 0 – IBMC, CA-4CH-I07-001-01- 12 - IBM GSA
CA-4CH-I07-001-01-71-IBMC, CA-4CH-I07-001-01-94-IBMC
scope_of_work.justification: Normal DC Practice when a customer leaves the facility
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Costs will be absorbed by Kyndryl, this is a customer responsibility

project_name: UPM-2777384 - 3600 Steeles Ave East Markham - EPMS (Powerlogic system) Annual Service

scope_of_work.problem: Annual EPMS service and Maintenance conducted by Schneider canada. Inspection and maintenance of system integrity and overall performance
scope_of_work.scope:
Schneider electric to conduct service as follows:
-PC health
-Database maintenance
-Communications
-Diagrams
-Alarms
-Field Device maintenance
-Backups
scope_of_work.justification: Electrical Power Management Systems (EPMS) provides visibility into complex and dynamic networks from the electric utility service points and alternate energy sources all the way to critical loads.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: System health could be overlooked and lead to future faults.

scope_of_work.problem: The Payment Canada team requested to power cycle its key box at F4, 3600 Steeles site. this key box is directly connected to RPP-F4-3A1/3B1 Panel1 CCT#35 so we need to engage building operation team to perform the power cycling work
scope_of_work.scope:
Inspect and verify the Payment Canada Keywatcher in F4 power connections to RPP-F4-3A1/3B1 Panel1 CCT#35.
Power cycling the keywatcher via switching on/off the breakers at RPP-F4-3A1/3B1 Panel1 CCT#35.
Follow DataCenter and CBRE procedures to perform the work.
Update any log-book if required.
The work is to be done during the normal business hours
